sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnservereqpmninfo ( SERVER_EQPMN_ID /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_NM /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_IP /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , OPERSYSM_INFO /* */ , CPU_INFO /* */ , MORY_INFO /* */ , HDDISK /* */ , ETC_INFO /* */ , RGSDE /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #serverEqpmnId# /* */ , #serverEqpmnNm# /* */ , #serverEqpmnIp# /* */ , #serverEqpmnMngr# /* */ , #mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , #opersysmInfo# /* */ , #cpuInfo# /* */ , #moryInfo# /* */ , #hddisk# /* */ , #etcInfo# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnservereqpmninfo SET SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_NM=#serverEqpmnNm# /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_IP=#serverEqpmnIp# /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR=#serverEqpmnMngr# /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES=#mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , OPERSYSM_INFO=#opersysmInfo# /* */ , CPU_INFO=#cpuInfo# /* */ , MORY_INFO=#moryInfo# /* */ , HDDISK=#hddisk# /* */ , ETC_INFO=#etcInfo# /* */ , RGSDE=#rgsde# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_NM /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_IP /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , OPERSYSM_INFO /* */ , CPU_INFO /* */ , MORY_INFO /* */ , HDDISK /* */ , ETC_INFO /* */ , RGSDE /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnservereqpmninfo WHERE SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */

SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_NM /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_IP /* */ , SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , OPERSYSM_INFO /* */ , CPU_INFO /* */ , MORY_INFO /* */ , HDDISK /* */ , ETC_INFO /* */ , RGSDE /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnservereqpmninfo WHERE 1=1
SERVER_EQPMN_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
SERVER_EQPMN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY SERVER_EQPMN_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnservereqpmninfo WHERE 1=1
SERVER_EQPMN_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
SERVER_EQPMN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
